message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
You started high, now it's my turn to drive a hard bargain!
I'll meet you halfway, but don't expect me to give away too much more!
You're getting closer, but I'm still not satisfied
I'm getting closer to your price, but I still want a fair share!
I'm starting to think you're not serious about a deal
I'm willing to compromise, but don't expect me to give away the farm!
You're getting desperate, I can smell it!
I'm running out of patience, but I'm still willing to negotiate!
You're getting down to the wire, I'm not budging
I'm making one last stand, take it or leave it!
